h5_1: Collection and Use of Online Information
p_1:
This vaccination-covid19 's website  is committed to maintaining your privacy and protecting your personal information

        When you visit our website, certain data, such as your computer's unique Internet protocol (IP) address,
        will be automatically collected and sent to the servers that support our website system to help us provide better service
        and a more effective website. In order to visit certain areas of this site, or to use certain services, you gonna be asked to provide personal information,
        such as your name, address, or gender...  If you decline to provide requested information,
        our ability to serve you may be limited. But you will still be able to visit the site
        and take advantage of the wealth of information it offers.
p_2:
Please be assured that this site is equipped with security measures to protect the information you provide us.
        We ecrypt passwords and other data that must remain secure to meet legal requirements.
p_3:
Your individual identifying information will not be shared, sold, or transferred to any third party without your prior consent,
        or unless it is required by law.
        It is available to District web development employees only for the purpose of maintaining the website and improving the site visitor experience.
